heading: ID
comment: The identifier given to the organisation, corresponding to that used in the collection files.

heading: URI (BnF)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Bibliothèque nationale de France database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Germania Sacra)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Germania Sacra database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (GND)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Deutschen Nationalbibliothek database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (ISNI)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the International Standard Name Identifier database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (LC)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Library of Congress database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (SUDOC)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Système Universitaire de Documentation database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (VIAF)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Virtual International Authority File database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: URI (Wikidata)
comment: The URI given to the organisation within the Wikidata database, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element with a corresponding value in a title element.

heading: other ref(s)
xpath: //tei:org/string-join(tei:note/tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[not(.//tei:title[normalize-space(.)="BNF" or lower-case(normalize-space(.))="germania sacra" or normalize-space(.)="GND" or normalize-space(.)="ISNI" or normalize-space(.)="LC" or normalize-space(.)="SUDOC" or normalize-space(.)="VIAF" or normalize-space(.)="Wikidata"])]/tei:title/string-join(., ""), "; ")
comment: Other references given for the organisation, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element without a title element corresponding to the databases defined for the preceding columns.

heading: other URI(s)
xpath: //tei:org/string-join(tei:note/tei:list[@type="links"]//tei:ref[not(.//tei:title[normalize-space(.)="BNF" or lower-case(normalize-space(.))="germania sacra" or normalize-space(.)="GND" or normalize-space(.)="ISNI" or normalize-space(.)="LC" or normalize-space(.)="SUDOC" or normalize-space(.)="VIAF" or normalize-space(.)="Wikidata"])]/@target, " ")
comment: Other references given for the organisation, as encoded within a @target attribute to a ref element without a title element corresponding to the databases defined for the preceding columns.

heading: display
comment: The standard name assigned to the organisation.

heading: variant
comment: Any variant name(s) assigned to the organisation.

heading: crossref
comment: Any crossreferencing name(s) assigned to the organisation.

heading: affiliation
comment: The affiliation of the organisation, if applicable. This column usually contains details of religious orders.

heading: geo
comment: The geographic latitude and longitude of the organisation.

heading: geo source
comment: The source of the latitude and longitude information. Usually a URI.

heading: latitude
comment: The geographic latitude of the organisation, formatted as a number.

heading: longitude
comment: The geographic longitude of the organisation, formatted as a number.

heading: settlement
comment: The settlement associated with the organisation.

heading: settlement ID
comment: The identifier, corresponding with the places authority file, given to the settlement associated with the organisation. This column will be empty as settlements don't have @key attributes, but may in future.

heading: country
comment: The country associated with the organisation.

heading: country ID
comment: The identifier, corresponding with the places authority file, given to the country associated with the organisation.

heading: bibl(s)
comment: All bibliographic references associated with this organisation, as encoded within bibl elements.

heading: note(s)
comment: Notes about the organisation, as given within a child note element to the org element.
